sentences.text: In the event of a change of control (as defined in the Omnibus Plan and summarized below), except as otherwise provided in the applicable award agreement, the Compensation Committee may provide for:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: continuation or assumption of outstanding awards under the Omnibus Plan by us (if we are the surviving corporation) or by the surviving corporation or its parent;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: substitution by the surviving corporation or its parent of awards with substantially the same terms and value as such outstanding awards under the Omnibus Plan;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: acceleration of the vesting (including the lapse of any restrictions, with any performance criteria or conditions deemed met at target) or the right to exercise outstanding awards immediately prior to the date of the change of control and the expiration of awards not timely exercised by the date determined by the Compensation Committee; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: in the case of outstanding stock options and SARs, cancelation in consideration of a payment in cash or other consideration equal to the intrinsic value of the award.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee may, in its sole discretion, terminate without the payment of any consideration, any stock options or SARs for which the exercise or hurdle price is equal to or exceeds the per share value of the consideration to be paid in the change of control transaction.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the Omnibus Plan, except as otherwise provided in a participants award agreement, change of control generally means the occurrence of one or more of the following events:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the acquisition of more than 50% of the combined voting power of our outstanding securities (other than by an employee benefit plan or trust maintained by us);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the replacement of the majority of our directors during any 12-month period;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the consummation of our merger or consolidation with another entity (unless our voting securities outstanding immediately before such transaction continue to represent at least 50% of the combined voting power and total fair market value of the securities of the surviving entity, or if applicable, the ultimate parent thereof, outstanding immediately after such transaction); or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the transfer of our assets having an aggregate fair market value of more than 50% of the fair market value of the company and our subsidiaries immediately before such transfer, but only to the extent that in connection with such transfer or within a reasonable period thereafter, our stockholders receive distributions of cash and/or assets having a fair market value that is greater than 50% of the fair market value of us and our subsidiaries immediately before such transfer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Restricted Stock Unit and Performance Stock Unit Award Agreements
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event of a Change of Control, the actual number of performance stock units earned will be determined and will remain subject to time-based vesting conditions until the end of the original vesting period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If within 12 months following a Change of Control, the participants employment is terminated by the Company without cause (as defined in the Omnibus Plan) or the participant resigns for good reason (as defined in the Omnibus Plan), restricted stock units and performance stock units will fully vest and be settled immediately following the termination.

sentences.text: n addition to severance pay, under our severance policy our NEOs would also be entitled to receive benefits under our hen-existing health and welfare plans for a period of one month following the month in which termination of employment occurs at active employee rates, which is in addition to the COBRA continuation coverage periods.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Outplacement services would also be offered for 12 months.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We may amend or terminate this practice at any time.

sentences.text: The material terms of the agreements entered into with our NEOs are summarized below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Employment Agreement with Mr. Van Saun
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As discussed above, we entered into an amended employment agreement with Mr. Van Saun on May 5, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Van Sauns agreement has an initial term of five years beginning on May 5, 2016, which will renew automatically for an additional two-year term unless either the Company or Mr. Van Saun elects not to renew.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There is no further opportunity or automatic renewal beyond the additional two-year term.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event of Mr. Van Sauns voluntary resignation, he would be required to provide the Company at least six months notice in order to effectuate an orderly handover of duties.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Van Saun is entitled to receive an annual base salary of $1,487,000 (unchanged from his 2015 salary) and has a target total compensation opportunity of $7,500,000, with the form and terms of his variable compensation to be determined annually by the Compensation Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, Mr. Van Saun is eligible to participate in employee benefits available to the Companys senior executives generally, and is also entitled to the business use of a company car.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, Mr. Van Saun was granted a special one-time equity award with a grant date target value of $3,000,000, half in the form of restricted stock units and half in the form of performance stock units with objectives aligned to financial, risk, customer and enterprise initiatives of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This award will become vested on the three-year anniversary of the grant date (in the case of the performance stock units, with vesting level depending on performance), provided Mr. Van Saun does not resign prior to that date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee determined that making this one-time award to Mr. Van Saun would provide additional retentive value, in addition to providing him with consideration for the elimination of his pension benefit funding in a form that further aligns Mr. Van Saun with the strategic objectives of the business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the terms of his agreement, Mr. Van Saun is also entitled to the following payments and benefits upon termination of employment in various scenarios, in each case, subject to execution and non-revocation of a release in our favor:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Termination without cause or resignation for good reason absent a change of control    Mr. Van Saun would receive a lump sum cash severance payment equal to two times base salary and would also receive a pro-rata portion of his target cash incentive for the year of termination payable when incentives are paid to other executives, in each case, subject to an orderly handover of duties.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, his outstanding unvested equity awards would continue to vest on their original schedule, with performance stock units subject to actual performance and, in each case, subject to Mr. Van Saun not engaging in specified detrimental activity for 12 months post-termination.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It should be noted that the Companys election not to renew the agreement for an additional two year term would constitute a termination without cause.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event a qualifying termination of employment occurs within 24 months following a change of control, Mr. Van Saun would receive a lump sum cash severance payment equal to three times the sum of base salary and his target cash incentive for the year of termination, plus a pro-rata portion of his target cash incentive for the year of termination.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon the change of control, Mr. Van Sauns performance stock units would be frozen at target performance level, but not accelerated.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Following the subsequent qualifying termination, all of Mr. Van Sauns outstanding equity awards would immediately vest and be paid.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The agreement also provides that if any payments or benefits to Mr. Van Saun (whether or not under the employment agreement) would be considered parachute payments pursuant to Internal Revenue Code Section 280G, these payments and benefits would be reduced to the maximum amount that does not trigger the excise tax under Internal Revenue Code Section 4999 unless the executive would be better off (on an after-tax basis) if the executive received all payments and benefits due and paid all excise and income taxes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The employment agreement does not provide any gross-up for excise taxes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Van Saun currently meets the Companys retirement rule as his age plus years of service equals or exceeds 65, with a minimum of at least five years of service.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In connection with Mr. Van Sauns retirement, he would be required to provide at least six months notice and effectuate an orderly handover of duties.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the time of ermination, if the Company requires Mr. Van Saun to work during the notice period, the Company and Mr. Van Saun would mutually agree on how a pro-rata portion of his variable compensation (excluding performance-based awards) for the year in termination would be payable.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Outstanding unvested equity awards, other han the one-time special award granted in May 2016, would continue to vest on heir original schedule, with performance stock units subject to actual performance and, in each case, subject to Mr. Van Saun not engaging in competitive activity during the remaining vesting period or specified detrimental activity for 12 months post-termination.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The one-time special award would be forfeited.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Van Sauns estate would receive his base salary through the end of the month n which his death occurs as well as a pro-rata portion of his target cash incentive.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: n addition, his outstanding equity awards would immediately vest and be paid, with performance stock units payable at target level.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Van Saun would continue to receive his base salary up to the date he becomes eligible for long-term disability benefits under the Companys plan (currently, six months) and, in addition, his outstanding unvested equity awards would continue to vest on their original schedule, with performance stock units subject to actual performance and, in each case, subject to Mr. Van Saun not engaging in competitive activity during the remaining vesting period or specified detrimental activity for 12 months post-termination.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Van Saun is subject to a perpetual confidentiality covenant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, Mr. Van Saun is subject to non-competition and non-solicitation covenants.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The non-competition covenant applies for six months post-termination, concurrent to any notice period, in the event of a termination without cause or resignation for good reason.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For this purpose, competitors are defined to include the following companies: JP Morgan Chase, Bank of America, Citigroup, Wells Fargo, US Bancorp, Regions Financial Corp., M&T Bank Corp., PNC, Fifth Third, Sun Trust, Comerica, KeyCorp, BB&T, Capital One and TD Bank.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The non-solicitation covenant prohibits solicitation of employees as well as customers and prospective clients for twelve months post-termination, concurrent to any notice period, in the event of a termination without cause or resignation for good reason.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The agreement includes the following definitions of cause and good reason:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Cause includes:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) any indictment for, conviction of, plea of guilty or nolo contendere to by Mr. Van Saun for the commission of:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) any felony,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) any criminal offense within the scope of Section 19 of the Federal Deposit Insurance Act, 12 U.S. C.  1829; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (c) a misdemeanor involving dishonesty;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) if Mr. Van Saun willfully commits a material breach of his obligations under his employment agreement or repeats or continues after written warning any material breach of his obligations under his employment agreement, or is, in the opinion of the board, guilty of gross misconduct which brings him or the company or any of its affiliates into disrepute;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) if Mr. Van Saun is guilty of dishonesty in the conduct of his duties under his employment agreement, gross incompetence, willful neglect of duty, or of mismanagement of his financial affairs through failure to observe the companys rules and procedures for the operation of bank accounts and/or borrowing;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) if Mr. Van Saun commits any act of bankruptcy or takes advantage of any statute for the time being in force offering relief to insolvent debtors; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (v) if, as a result of any default on the part of Mr. Van Saun, he is prohibited by law from acting as an officer of the company or any of its affiliates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Good Reason includes a material breach of the employment agreement by the company, or a substantial diminution or other substantial adverse change, not consented to by Mr. Van Saun, in the nature or scope of his responsibilities, authorities, powers, functions or duties or in his base salary, except that removal of the role of chairman of the company from his duties shall not amount to good reason.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: DIRECTOR COMPENSATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Citizens Financial Group, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Non- Employee Director Compensation Policy (Director Compensation Policy) provides for the following elements of director compensation:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual Cash Retainer     $75,000 Annual Restricted Stock Unit Retainer     $100,000 Lead Director Cash Retainer     $25,000 Audit Chair Cash Retainer     $30,000 Other Committee Chair Cash Retainers     $15,000
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Non-employee directors receive their cash retainers in quarterly installments, in advance of each quarter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, each non-employee director who attends more than six meetings of any committee of our Board in any calendar year also receives an additional cash fee of $1,500 for each such additional meeting attended (regardless of whether attended in person or by telephone).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On the date of each annual meeting of our stockholders, each non-employee director receives an annual grant of restricted stock units under the Citizens Financial Group, Inc. 2014 Non-Employee Directors Compensation Plan (Directors Plan), having a fair market value of $100,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual awards vest 100% on the first anniversary of the grant date, subject to the terms and conditions of the Directors Plan and the applicable award agreement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Starting with grants made in 2016, director awards are subject to mandatory deferral and are not settled until directors cessation of service.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director awards fully vest upon a change of control (as defined in the above description of the Omnibus Plan) or a non-employee directors cessation of service for any reason (other than under circumstances which would constitute cause under the terms of our bylaws or applicable law).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, our directors are eligible to receive matching charitable contributions up to $5,000 per year, as part of our general charitable contribution program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our non-employee directors do not participate in our employee benefit programs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors may defer up to 100% of their cash retainers and other cash fees under our Directors Deferred Compensation Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No Company contributions are made to this plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Contributions to this plan are credited with interest on a monthly basis, based on the applicable interest crediting rate applicable for the month interest is to be posted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The interest crediting rate is the annualized average yield on the United States Treasury bond 10-year constant maturity for the immediately preceding calendar quarter plus two percent (2%), which is then divided by 12 to determine the monthly interest crediting rate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There are no above-market or preferential earnings on compensation deferred pursuant to this plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors also receive reimbursement of business expenses incurred in connection with their attendance at meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As discussed in above in Compensation Discussion and AnalysisStock Ownership and Retention Guidelines, non-employee directors are required to hold shares with a value at least equal to four times their annual cash retaine
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROPOSAL 3: RATIFICATION OF APPOINTMENT OF OUR INDEPENDENT REGISTERED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee has appointed Deloitte & Touche LLP, an independent registered public accounting firm, as the independent auditors to perform an integrated audit of the Company for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Deloitte & Touche LLP served as our independent auditors for the fiscal year ended December 31, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Neither our Bylaws nor other governing documents or law require stockholder ratification of the selection of Deloitte & Touche LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, the Board believes that obtaining stockholder ratification of the appointment is a sound corporate governance practice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the stockholders do not vote on an advisory basis in favor of Deloitte & Touche LLP, the Audit Committee will reconsider whether to hire the firm and may retain Deloitte & Touche LLP or hire another firm without resubmitting the matter for stockholders to approve.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee retains the discretion at any time to appoint a different independent auditor.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Representatives of Deloitte & Touche LLP are expected to be present at the annual meeting, available to respond to appropriate questions, and will have the opportunity to make a statement if they desire.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: AUDIT COMMITTEE REPORT
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The purpose of the Audit Committee (the Committee) is to assist Citizens Financial Group, Inc.s (the Company) Board of Directors (the Board) in its oversight of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the integrity of the financial statements of the Company,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the appointment, qualifications, independence, performance and retention of the Companys independent external auditor,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) the performance of the Companys internal audit function, and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) compliance by the Company with legal and regulatory requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee operates pursuant to a charter that was last amended and restated by the Board on February 25, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As set forth in the charter, management of the Company is primarily responsible for the adequacy and effectiveness of the Companys financial reporting process, systems of internal accounting and financial controls.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Deloitte & Touche LLP (Deloitte), the Companys independent auditor for 2016, is responsible for expressing opinions on the conformity of the Companys audited financial statements with generally accepted accounting principles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In this context, the Committee has reviewed and discussed with management and Deloitte the audited financial statements for the year ended December 31, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee has discussed with Deloitte the matters that are required to be discussed under PCAOB standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Deloitte has provided to the Committee the written disclosures and the PCAOB-required letter regarding the independent accountants communications with the Committee concerning ndependence, and the Committee has discussed with Deloitte, that firms independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on the review and discussions referred to above, the Committee recommended to the Board that the audited financial statements for the year ended December 31, 2016 be included in the Companys 2016 Annual Report on Form 10-K, for filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This report is provided by the following independent directors, who comprise the Committee:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Wendy A. Watson (Chair) William P. Hankowsky Leo I. Higdon
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: February 16, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Unless the type of service had previously been pre-approved, the Audit Committee must approve that specific service before the independent auditors may perform it.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, separate approval is required if the amount of fees for any pre-approved category of service exceeds the fee thresholds established by the Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee may delegate to the chair or any independent member of the committee pre-approval authority with respect to permitted services, provided that the member must report any pre-approval decisions to the Audit Committee at its next scheduled meeting.

sentences.text: QUESTIONS AND ANSWERS ABOUT THE PROXY MATERIALS AND THE ANNUAL MEETING
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This proxy statement and proxy card are furnished in connection with the solicitation of proxies to be voted at our Annual Meeting , which will be held on April 27, 2017, at 9:00 a.m.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eastern Time, at the Companys headquarters located at One Citizens Plaza, Providence, Rhode Island 02903.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Why am I receiving this proxy statement and proxy card?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You have received these proxy materials because our board of directors is soliciting your proxy to vote your shares at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This proxy statement describes issues on which we would like you to vote at our Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It also gives you information on these issues so that you can make an informed decision.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Because you own shares of our common stock, our board of directors has made this proxy statement and proxy card available to you on the Internet, in addition to delivering printed versions of this proxy statement and proxy card to certain stockholders by mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When you vote by using the Internet or (if you received your proxy card by mail) by signing and returning the proxy card, you appoint each of Bruce Van Saun, Stephen T. Gannon and Robin S. Elkowitz (with full power of substitution) as your representatives at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: They will vote your shares at the Annual Meeting as you have instructed them or, if an issue that is not on the proxy card comes up for vote, in accordance with their best judgment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This way, your shares will be voted whether or not you attend the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Even if you plan to attend the Annual Meeting, we encourage you to vote in advance by using the Internet or (if you received your proxy card by mail) by signing and returning your proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you vote by using the Internet, you do not need to return your proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Why did I receive a Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials in the mail instead of a printed set of proxy materials?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to rules adopted by the SEC, we are permitted to furnish our proxy materials over the Internet to our stockholders by delivering a Notice in the mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you received a Notice by mail, you will not receive a printed copy of the proxy materials in the mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Instead, the Notice instructs you on how to access and review the proxy statement and annual report over the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Notice also instructs you on how to electronically access and review all of the important information contained in this proxy statement and the annual report and how you may submit your proxy over the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you received a Notice by mail and would like to receive a printed copy of our proxy materials, you should follow the instructions for requesting these materials contained in the Notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders who receive a printed set of proxy materials will not receive the Notice but may still access our proxy materials and submit their proxies over the Internet by following the instructions provided on their proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who is entitled to vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Holders of our common stock at the close of business on March 3, 2017 (the record date) are entitled to vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with Delaware law, a list of stockholders entitled to vote at the meeting will
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: be available in electronic form at the Annual Meeting site on April 27, 2017 and will be accessible in electronic form for ten days before the meeting at our principal place of business located at One Citizens Plaza, Providence, Rhode Island 02903, between the hours of 9:00 a.m. and 5:00 p.m.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eastern Time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How many votes is each share of common stock entitled to?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Holders of common stock are entitled to one vote per share.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of March 3, 2017, there were 509,323,312 shares of our common stock outstanding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is the difference between a stockholder of record and a street name holder?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Many of our stockholders hold their shares through a broker, bank or other nominee rather than directly in their own name.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As summarized below, there are some differences between shares held of record and those owned beneficially.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholder of Record.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are registered directly in your name with the Companys transfer agent, Computershare, you are considered, with respect to those shares, the stockholder of record, and these proxy materials are being sent directly to you by the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As the stockholder of record, you have the right to grant your voting proxy directly to certain officers of Citizens Financial Group, Inc. or to vote in person at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company has enclosed or sent a proxy card for you to use.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may also vote on the Internet, as described below under the heading How do I vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beneficial Owner or Street Name Holder.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are held in an account at a broker, bank or other nominee, like many of our stockholders, you are considered the beneficial owner of shares held in street name, and these proxy materials were forwarded to you by that organization.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As the beneficial owner, you have the right to direct your broker, bank or other nominee how to vote your shares, and you are also invited to attend the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since a beneficial owner is not the stockholder of record, you may not vote your shares in person at the Annual Meeting unless you obtain a legal proxy from the broker, bank, or other nominee that is the stockholder of record of your shares giving you the right to vote the shares at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you do not wish to vote in person or you will not be attending the Annual Meeting, you may vote by proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote by proxy by completing, signing and returning the proxy card or by using the Internet or by telephone, as described below under the heading How do I vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How do I vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders of record may vote by using the Internet or (if you received a proxy card by mail) by mail as described below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders also may attend the meeting and vote in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you hold shares through a bank or broker, please refer to your proxy card, Notice or other information forwarded by your bank or broker to see which voting options are available to you.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote by using the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The address of the website for Internet voting can be found on your proxy card or Notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Internet voting is available 24 hours a day and will be accessible until 11:59 p.m.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eastern Time on April 26, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Easy-to-follow instructions allow you to vote your shares and confirm that your instructions have been properly recorded.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote by telephone.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dial the number listed on your proxy card or your voting instruction form.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You will need the control number included on your proxy card or voting instruction form.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote by mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you received a proxy card by mail and choose to vote by mail, simply mark your proxy card, date and sign it, and return it in the postage-paid envelope.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The method you use to vote will not limit your right to vote at the Annual Meeting if you decide to attend in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Written ballots will be passed out to anyone who wants to vote at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you hold your shares in street name, you must obtain a proxy, executed in your favor, from the holder of record to be able to vote in person at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What if I change my mind after I return my proxy?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may revoke your proxy and change your vote at any time before the polls close at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may do his by:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: submitting a subsequent proxy by using the Internet, telephone or by mail with a later date;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: sending written notice of revocation to our Corporate Secretary, Citizens Financial Group, Inc., 600 Washington Boulevard, Stamford, Connecticut 06901; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: voting in person at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: f you hold shares through a bank or broker, please refer to your proxy card, Notice or other information forwarded by your bank or broker to see how you can revoke your proxy and change your vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Attendance at the meeting will not by itself revoke a proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How many votes do you need to hold the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The presence, in person or by proxy, of the holders of a majority of the total voting power of all outstanding securities entitled to vote at the Annual Meeting will constitute a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a quorum is present, we can hold the Annual Meeting and conduct business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On what items am I voting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You are being asked to vote on three items:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. the election of each of the twelve directors nominated by the Board and named in the proxy statement to serve until the 2018 annual meeting or until their successors are duly elected and qualified;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2. advisory vote to approve the Companys executive compensation, commonly referred to as a say on pay vote and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3. ratification of the appointment of Deloitte & Touche LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm for fiscal year 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No cumulative voting rights are authorized, and dissenters rights are not applicable to these matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How does the board of directors recommend that I vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board recommends that you vote as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. FOR the twelve director nominees;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2. FOR the approval, on an advisory basis, of the Companys executive compensation; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3. FOR the ratification of the appointment of our independent registered public accounting firm
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How may I vote in the election of directors, and how many votes must the nominees receive to be elected?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to the election of directors, you may:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: vote FOR the twelve nominees for director;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: vote FOR any of the nominees for director and vote AGAINST or ABSTAIN from voting on the other nominees for director;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: vote AGAINST the twelve nominees for director; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ABSTAIN from voting on all of the nominees for director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Bylaws provide for the election of directors by an affirmative majority of the votes cast in an uncontested election.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Thi means each of the twelve individuals nominated for election to the board of directors must receive more votes cast FOR than AGAINST (among votes properly cast in person, electronically or by proxy) to be elected.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker non-votes are not considered votes cast for the foregoing purpose, and will have no effect on the election of nominees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the election of directors is not an uncontested election, then the directors are elected by a plurality of the votes cast.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What happens if a nominee does not receive a majority of FOR votes?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a nominee does not receive a majority of FOR votes, he or she shall tender to the Board, via the Chair of the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee, his or her resignation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee will consider the resignation and make a recommendation to the Board whether to accept or reject the tendered resignation no later than 60 days following the date of the Annual Meeting in accordance with the specific requirements outlined in our Corporate Governance Guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What happens if a nominee is unable to stand for election?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a nominee is unable to stand for election, the Board may either:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reduce the number of directors that serve on the Board; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: designate a substitute nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: f the Board designates a substitute nominee, shares represented by proxies voted for the nominee who is unable to stand or election will be voted for the substitute nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How may I cast my advisory vote for the proposal to approve the Companys executive compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to this proposal, you may:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: vote FOR the approval, on an advisory basis, of the Companys executive compensation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: vote AGAINST the approval, on an advisory basis, of the Companys executive compensation; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ABSTAIN from voting on the proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with applicable law, this vote is advisory, meaning it will serve as a recommendation to the Board, but will not be binding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee will carefully consider the outcome of this vote when determining future executive compensation arrangements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker non-votes will not count as votes cast.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How may I vote for the proposal to ratify the appointment of our independent registered public accounting firm, and how many votes must this proposal receive to pass?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to this proposal, you may:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: vote FOR the ratification of the accounting firm;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: vote AGAINST the ratification of the accounting firm; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ABSTAIN from voting on the proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In order to pass, the proposal must receive the affirmative vote of a majority of the votes cast at the Annual Meeting by the holders who are present in person or by proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions will not count as votes cast.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What happens if I sign and return my proxy card but do not provide voting instructions?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: f you return a signed card but do not provide voting instructions, your shares will be voted as follows
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. FOR the twelve director nominees;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2. FOR the approval, on an advisory basis, of the Companys executive compensation; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3. FOR the ratification of the appointment of our independent registered public accounting firm
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Will my shares be voted if I do not vote by using the Internet, telephone or by signing and returning my proxy card?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you do not vote by using the Internet, telephone or (if you received a proxy card by mail) by signing and returning your proxy card, then your shares will not be voted and will not count in deciding the matters presented for stockholder consideration at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are held in street name through a bank or broker, your bank or broker may vote your shares under certain limited circumstances if you do not provide voting instructions before the Annual Meeting, in accordance with the NYSE rules that govern banks and brokers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These circumstances include voting your shares on routine matters, such as the ratification of the appointment of our independent registered public accountants described in this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to the proposal to ratify the appointment of our independent registered public accounting firm, therefore, if you do not vote your shares, your bank or broker may vote your shares on your behalf or leave your shares unvoted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The election of directors and approval, on an advisory basis, of the Companys executive compensation are not considered routine matters under the NYSE rules relating to voting by banks and brokers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When a proposal is not a routine matter and the brokerage firm has not received voting instructions from the beneficial owner of the shares with respect to that proposal, the brokerage firm cannot vote the shares on that proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This is called a broker non-vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Broker non-votes that are represented at the Annual Meeting will be counted for purposes of establishing a quorum, but not for determining the number of shares voted for or against the non-routine matter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We encourage you to provide instructions to your bank or brokerage firm by voting your proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This action ensures your shares will be voted at the meeting in accordance with your wishes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is the vote required for each proposal to pass, and what is the effect of abstentions or withheld votes and uninstructed shares on the proposals?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Bylaws provide for the election of directors by an affirmative majority of the votes cast in an uncontested election.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This means that the twelve individuals nominated for election to the board of directors must receive more votes FOR than AGAINST (among votes properly cast in person, electronically or by proxy) to be elected.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker non-votes are not considered votes cast for the foregoing purpose, and will have no effect on the election of nominees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If he election of directors is not an uncontested election then the directors are elected by a plurality of the votes cast.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For each other proposal to pass in accordance with our Bylaws, the proposal must receive the affirmative vote of a majority of the votes cast in person, electronically or by proxy at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker non-votes are not counted as votes cast.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following table summarizes the Boards recommendation on each proposal and the vote required for each proposal to pass.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal Number    Item    Board Voting Recommendation    Votes Required for Approval 1    Election of Directors    FOR ALL    The twelve nominees who receive a majority of FOR votes properly cast in person, electronically or by proxy and entitled to vote will be elected 2    Advisory vote to approve the Companys executive compensation, commonly referred to as a say on pay vote    FOR    Majority of the votes cast by the holders of shares present in person, electronically or by proxy and entitled to vote 3    Ratification of independent registered public accounting firm    FOR    Majority of the votes cast by the holders of shares present in person, electronically or by proxy and entitled to vote
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What do I need to show to attend the Annual Meeting in person?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You will need proof of your share ownership (such as a recent brokerage statement or letter from your broker showing that you owned shares of the Companys common stock as of March 3, 2017 if you hold your shares through a broker) and a form of government-issued photo identification.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you do not have proof of ownership and valid photo identification, you may not be admitted to the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No cameras, cell phones, smart phones, laptops, tablets, or recording equipment are permitted in the meeting room.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, large bags, backpacks, briefcases, and similar items are not permitted in the meeting room.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who bears the cost of the proxy materials?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company pays for preparing, printing and mailing this proxy statement and the annual report.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Officers and employees of the Company may solicit the return of proxies, but will not receive additional compensation for those efforts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company will request that brokers, banks, custodians, nominees and other fiduciaries send proxy materials to all beneficial owners and upon
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: request will reimburse them for their expenses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Can I receive future proxy materials and annual reports electronically?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Yes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Instead of receiving future paper copies in the mail, you can elect to receive our future annual reports and proxy materials electronically.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Opting to receive your proxy materials electronically will save us the cost of producing and mailing documents to your home or business, and will reduce the environmental impact of our annual meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a stockholder of record and wish to enroll in the electronic proxy delivery service for future meetings, you may do so by going to the website provided on your proxy card and following the prompts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: OTHER BUSINESS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board is not aware of any other matters to be presented at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If any other matter proper for action at the meeting should be presented, the holders of the accompanying proxy will vote the shares represented by the proxy on such matter in accordance with their best judgment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If any matter not proper for action at the meeting should be presented, the holders of the proxy will vote against consideration of the matter or the proposed action.

sentences.text: 2018 ANNUAL MEETING AND STOCKHOLDER PROPOSALS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company will review for inclusion in next years proxy statement stockholder proposals submitted pursuant to SEC Rule 14a-8 that are received by November 7, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In order for a stockholder proposal or director nomination to be considered for inclusion in our proxy materials for our annual meeting of stockholders, expected to be held in April 2018, the proposal or director nomination must be received by our Corporate Secretary, Citizens Financial Group, Inc., 600 Washington Boulevard, Stamford, Connecticut 06901, on or before the close of business on November 7, 2017, and must comply with the rules and regulations promulgated by the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These stockholder notices also must comply with the requirements of our Bylaws and will not be effective otherwise.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Bylaws impose some procedural requirements on stockholders who wish to nominate directors, propose that a director be removed, propose any repeal or change in our Bylaws or propose any other business to be brought before an annual or special meeting of stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under these procedural requirements, in order to bring a proposal before a meeting of stockholders, a stockholder must deliver timely notice of a proposal pertaining to a proper subject for presentation at the annual meeting to our Corporate Secretary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To be timely, a stockholders notice for proposals outside of SEC Rule 14a-8 must be delivered to the Corporate Secretary at 600 Washington Boulevard, Stamford, Connecticut, 06901 not less than 120 days or more than 150 days prior to the first anniversary of the preceding years annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Therefore, to be presented at our annual meeting of stockholders to be held in 2018, such a proposal must be received on or after November 29, 2017, but not later than December 28, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event that the date of the annual meeting of stockholders to be held in 2017 is advanced by more than 30 days or delayed by more than 70 days from the anniversary date of this years annual meeting of stockholders, such notice by the stockholder must be so received no earlier than 120 days prior to the annual meeting of stockholders to be held in 2018 and not later than 70 days prior to such annual meeting of stockholders to be held in 2018 or 10 days following the day on which public announcement of the date of such annual meeting is first made.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A stockholders notice to the Corporate Secretary shall set forth
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) as to each person whom the stockholder proposes to nominate for election or reelection as a director all information relating to such person that is required to be disclosed in solicitations of proxies for election of directors, or is otherwise required, in each case pursuant to Regulation 14A under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (as amended, together with the rules and regulations promulgated thereunder, the Exchange Act) including such persons written consent to being named in the proxy statement as a nominee and to serving as a director if elected,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) as to any other business that the stockholder proposes to bring before the meeting, a brief description of the business desired to be brought before the meeting, the text of the proposal or business (including the text of any resolutions proposed for consideration and in the event that such business includes a proposal to amend the Bylaws, the text of the proposed amendment), the reasons for conducting such business and any material interest in such business of such stockholder and the beneficial owner, if any, on whose behalf the proposal is made and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) as to the stockholder giving the notice and the beneficial owner, if any, on whose behalf the proposal is made:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the name and address of such stockholder (as they appear on the Companys books) and any such beneficial owner;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the number of shares of capital stock of the Company that are held of record or are beneficially owned by such stockholder and by any such beneficial owner;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: a description of any agreement, arrangement or understanding between or among such stockholder and any such beneficial owner, any of their respective affiliates or associates, and any other person or persons (including their names) in connection with the proposal of such nomination or other business;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: a description of any agreement, arrangement or understanding (including, regardless of the form of settlement, any derivative, long or short positions, profit interests, forwards, futures, swaps, options, warrants, convertible securities, stock appreciation or similar rights, hedging transactions and borrowed or loaned shares) that has been entered into by or on behalf of, or any other agreement, arrangement or understanding that has been made, the effect or intent of which is to create or mitigate loss to, manage risk or benefit of share price changes for, or increase or decrease the voting power of, such stockholder or any such beneficial owner or any such nominee with respect to the Companys securities;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: a representation that the stockholder is a holder of record of stock of the Company entitled to vote at such meeting and intends to appear in person or by proxy at the meeting to bring such nomination or other business before the meeting;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: a representation as to whether such stockholder or any such beneficial owner intends or is part of a group that intends to
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) deliver a proxy statement and/or form of proxy to holders of at least the percentage of the voting power of the Companys outstanding capital stock required to approve or adopt the proposal or to elect each such nominee and/or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) otherwise to solicit proxies from stockholders in support of such proposal or nomination;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: any other information relating to such stockholder, beneficial owner, if any, or director nominee or proposed business that would be required to be disclosed in a proxy statement or other filing required to be made in connection with the solicitation of proxies in support of such nominee or proposal pursuant to Section 14 of the Exchange Act; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: such other information relating to any proposed item of business as the Company may reasonably require to determine whether such proposed item of business is a proper matter for stockholder action.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This reduces the volume of duplicate information received at your household and helps to reduce costs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you want to receive separate copies of the proxy statement, annual report to stockholders or Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials in the future, or if you are receiving multiple copies and would like to receive only one copy per household, you should contact your bank, broker or other nominee record holder.
